extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed firmware version and configurations.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?
Is FTP Server enabled and not needed?

extracted_playbook.title: Deactivate FTP Server
extracted_playbook.description: Deactivate the FTP Server through the product settings in the web-based management if FTP data transfer is not needed.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply General Security Best Practices
extracted_playbook.description: Use general security best practices to protect systems from local and network attacks. Do not allow direct access to the device from untrusted networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Firmware
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the latest firmware according to the table in chapter solutions.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect ICS from Internet Access
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure that industrial control systems (ICS) are not directly accessible from the Internet and apply the defense-in-depth strategy.

extracted_playbook.title: Consult BSI ICS Security Compendium
extracted_playbook.description: Refer to the BSI ICS Security Compendium for general information on securing ICS.

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Fixed Firmware Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update to the fixed firmware version as listed for each product model.
